experiment.name: mnist_hyperparameter_optimization_extended
experiment.description: Extended hyperparameter optimization for MNIST with structural parameters

network.grid_size.description: Spatial grid size (4x4 to 10x10) - affects receptive field size

network.num_orientations.description: Number of edge orientations - more orientations = finer edge detection

network.edge_threshold.description: Minimum edge strength to generate spikes - lower = more sensitive

neuron.similarity_threshold.description: Pattern matching threshold - lower = more generalization

neuron.max_patterns.description: Maximum patterns per neuron - more = better memory, slower

neuron.window_size_ms.description: Temporal window for spike patterns - affects temporal resolution

classification.k_neighbors.description: k-NN parameter - higher k = smoother decision boundaries

encoding.spike_timing_mode.description: How features are encoded into spike times

encoding.spike_intensity_scale.description: Scaling factor for spike timing based on feature intensity

learning.pattern_update_strategy.description: How to update neuron patterns when max_patterns is reached

network.neurons_per_orientation.description: Number of neurons per orientation (population coding)

network.lateral_inhibition.description: Lateral inhibition between neurons in same region

network.temporal_integration.description: Temporal integration factor for multi-frame processing
